Reviews.Title: "Makin Memories"
Reviews.Author: Jimmie Robinson
Reviews.Content: The wife always took the kids pics in the past-so now it G-Pa's turn. With 5 grandkids and lots of memories being made with camping - fishing and just all around fun weekends this was the pick after a bit of research. It's my first SLR and getting familiar with it. Completely happy with the pictures and the video of this camera. Learning more exciting things with it everyday.

Reviews.Title: canon rebel t4i
Reviews.Author: mmomin
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have bought a DSLR camera co I have no reference of comparison. But what I have seen so far has been great.
